Citizens have until February 6 to file claims and objections to reinstate their names before final rolls are published on March 6.

title: At 30%, Lucknow reports highest per cent of deletions

title: Centre imposes norms for AI-based cancer detection
description: The Indian government has brought AI-based cancer detection software under formal regulatory oversight, classifying them as Class C medical devices. This move ensures official approval, safety validation, and ongoing monitoring for AI tools used in analyzing medical images for cancer diagnosis. The regulation aims to protect patients and ensure scientifically validated claims by developers as AI's role in healthcare expands.

description: Telecom giant AT&T is moving its global headquarters to Plano, Texas. The company will build a new corporate campus on a 54-acre site. This move consolidates three existing Dallas-area locations. The new headquarters will be designed for collaboration and innovation. Employee feedback drove the decision for modern workspaces. Partial occupancy is targeted for the second half of 2028.

description: Venezuelan lawmaker Nicolas Maduro Guerra delivered an emotional plea in the national assembly following his father President Maduro's capture by US forces. He pledged loyalty to interim President Delcy Rodríguez and expressed hope for his father's swift return.  Maduro, facing drug trafficking charges in New York, declared himself 'still the leader of Venezuela,' intensifying regional tensions.

description: Yuvraj Singh reveals the distinct paths of Shubman Gill and Abhishek Sharma, nurtured under his guidance. Gill's exceptional dedication and adaptability propelled his rapid ascent, while Sharma's rise followed a structured four-year plan focused on national selection. Yuvraj highlights their contrasting styles: Sharma's fearless T20 aggression versus Gill's patient, consistent approach, creating a potent duo for Indian cricket.

Smith's Dean Jones moment; asks Carse to 'turn' his sunglasses - watch
description: A bizarre incident during the Ashes saw Steve Smith request bowler Brydon Carse to adjust his sunglasses due to sunlight glare. Carse promptly complied, moving them to the back of his head. Meanwhile, Smith achieved a significant milestone, becoming the second-highest run-scorer in Ashes history, surpassing Jack Hobbs.

title: 'Will Trump kidnap PM?' Chavan's bizarre remark amid Venezuela crisis; BJP hits back
description: Former Maharashtra CM Prithviraj Chavan linked US trade tensions and tariffs on India to the alleged CIA-led operation in Venezuela, questioning if President Trump would kidnap India's Prime Minister. He criticised the government's silence on Venezuela and its perceived fear of the US, highlighting India's need to find alternative export markets due to the 50% US tariff.

title: OpenAI IPO plans: Altman says no interest in public firms CEO role; timeline uncertain
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has expressed zero enthusiasm for leading a public company, despite acknowledging an IPO is likely necessary for capital and growth.  While he finds public market participation in value creation appealing, he anticipates the process will be 'annoying.'  The AI giant, valued at potentially $1 trillion, is reportedly preparing for a 2026 or 2027 listing.

title: Andrew McCutchen and Maria Hanslovan’s combined net worth and MLB earnings
description: Andrew McCutchen's stellar MLB career, marked by five All-Star selections and an MVP award, has been the bedrock of his substantial finances, amassing over $131 million from contracts. His wife, Maria Hanslovan, contributes significantly through her thriving fitness and wellness career. Together, their combined net worth is estimated between $60-$65 million, bolstered by endorsements and joint assets.

title: Taylor Swift reportedly shaken by Travis Kelce’s controversial confession
description: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have been dealing with a lot on their plate ever since they announced their engagement last year. While the two have kept themselves busy with planning their wedding, it seems Taylor Swift is deeply unsettled by some of Travis Kelce's words that he has said in public about his past. It seems this has become a huge deal for Taylor Swift ahead of their wedding.

title: Math genius Joel David Hamkins says AI models are basically useless for math tasks
description: Renowned mathematician Joel David Hamkins has voiced strong doubts about large language models' utility in mathematical research, calling their outputs "garbage" and "not mathematically correct." He highlights AI's frustrating tendency to confidently assert incorrectness and resist correction, mirroring unproductive human interactions. Despite AI's benchmark successes, Hamkins finds current systems unreliable for genuine research collaboration.
